SELECT qt.SCHED_NAME as sched_name, qt.TRIGGER_NAME as trigger_name, qt.TRIGGER_GROUP as trigger_group, qt.JOB_NAME as job_name, qt.JOB_GROUP as job_group, qt.DESCRIPTION as description, qt.NEXT_FIRE_TIME as next_fire_time, qt.PREV_FIRE_TIME as prev_fire_time, qt.PRIORITY as priority, qt.TRIGGER_STATE as trigger_state, qt.TRIGGER_TYPE as trigger_type, qt.END_TIME as end_time, qt.CALENDAR_NAME as calendar_name, qt.MISFIRE_INSTR as misfire_instr, qt.JOB_DATA as trigger_job_data, qjd.JOB_CLASS_NAME as job_calss_name, qjd.IS_DURABLE as is_durable, qjd.IS_NONCONCURRENT as is_nonconcurrent, qjd.IS_UPDATE_DATA as is_update_data, qjd.REQUESTS_RECOVERY as requests_recovery, qjd.JOB_DATA as job_details_job_data, qst.STR_PROP_1 as unit, qst.STR_PROP_2 as days_of_week, qst.STR_PROP_3 as start_time_of_day_andend_time_of_day, qst.INT_PROP_1 as `interval`, qst.LONG_PROP_1 as repeat_count, qst.LONG_PROP_2 as misfire_instruction, qct.TIME_ZONE_ID as cron_time_zone, qct.CRON_EXPRESSION as cron_expressopn FROM quartz.qrtz_triggers qt LEFT JOIN qrtz_job_details qjd ON qt.SCHED_NAME = qjd.SCHED_NAME AND qt.JOB_NAME = qjd.JOB_NAME AND qt.JOB_GROUP = qjd.JOB_GROUP LEFT JOIN qrtz_simprop_triggers qst ON qt.SCHED_NAME = qst.SCHED_NAME AND qt.TRIGGER_NAME = qst.TRIGGER_NAME AND qt.TRIGGER_GROUP = qst.TRIGGER_GROUP LEFT JOIN qrtz_cron_triggers qct ON qt.SCHED_NAME = qct.SCHED_NAME AND qt.TRIGGER_NAME = qct.TRIGGER_NAME AND qt.TRIGGER_GROUP = qct.TRIGGER_GROUP
